overview:
Mr. Jeffrey Schwartz is a Managing Director and Founding Partner of Bain Capital Ventures. Prior to joininh Bain Capital Ventures in 2000, Mr. Schwartz worked at Wellington Management company, where he was a portfolio manager for several public equities funds. He also served in the Equity Capital Markers Group of Merrill Lynch. In addition to his firm and portfolio company responsibilities, Mr. Schwartz serves on the Board of MetroLacrosse and the Investment Committee of the Noble and Greenough School. He also coaches several youth athletic teams.

Mr. Schwartz received an MBA from Harvard Business School and a BA in Economics from Dartmouth College.
